item.title: Hidden Markov Models
item.description: In this notebook I will be exploring a Hidden Markov Model (HMM) to classify bull and bear states of a simulated financial instrument. library(depmixS4) library(ggplot2) library(matrixStats) Simulate the data. Assume returns are normally distributed. Where the mean and the standard deviation depends on the state of the financial market. We will only consider 2 states. set.seed(42) Nk_lower <- 50 Nk_upper <- 150 bull_mean <- 0.1 bull_var <- 0.1 bear_mean <- -0.
